title: Fancy dress box space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fancy dress box space is a hotspot in the costume room of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode. Flatpacked versions of the furniture can be used to upgrade this space instead of raw materials.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Fancy dress box space
Fancy dress box space
Released18 October 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationPlayer-owned house (costume room)
OptionsBuild
ExamineA box for you to keep clothing.
Advanced data
Object ID18814

Fancy dress box space is a hotspot in the costume room of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode. Flatpacked versions of the furniture can be used to upgrade this space instead of raw materials.

Contents

  • 1 Uses
  • 2 Creation Menu
  • 3 Costumes
  • 4 Changes

Uses[edit | edit source]

Item Use
Oak fancy dress box Stores up to 2 types of costumes.
Teak fancy dress box Stores up to 4 types of costumes.
Mahogany fancy dress box Stores all types of costumes.

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[1] Level Dress box Materials Experience Upgrade Cost Total Cost
1 44 Oak fancy dress box Oak plank x2 120 N/A 930
2 62 Teak fancy dress box Oak fancy dress box
Teak plank x2 		180 1,710 2,640
3 80 Mahogany fancy dress box Teak fancy dress box
Mahogany plank x2 		280 4,272 6,912
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.

Costumes

Set Pieces
Beekeeper's outfit
Camouflage outfit
Royal frog costume
or
Lederhosen outfit
Mime outfit
Shade robes
Stale baguette
Zombie outfit

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
10 September 2020
(update)

The item's name in the built interface was changed from "Mahogany cos box" to "Mahogany costume box".

2 September 2020
(update | poll)

Fancy dress boxes can store partially completed sets.

23 July 2020
(update)

Furniture inside the costume room now follow an upgrading build pattern, similar to furniture found in the workshop. The toy box excluded from this change.

19 September 2019
(update)

Mudskipper hats and flippers can now be stored in the magic wardrobe, and the stale baguette in the fancy dress box.
